issue.title: GPU Lidar timestamp does not correspond with robot state

content.raw: [see gazebo pull reuqest #508](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/508/for-drcsim-issue-256/diff), where scene tics its own simulation time only after pose updates received from physics are applied to the scene.  Sensors report back `Sensor::lastMeasurementTime` from `Scene::GetSimTim()` as opposed to `World::GetSimTime()`.
content.html: see gazebo pull reuqest #508, where scene tics its own simulation time only after pose updates received from physics are applied to the scene. Sensors report back Sensor::lastMeasurementTime from Scene::GetSimTim() as opposed to World::GetSimTime().
